title: Add an in-app image gallery section using the 8 uploaded photos

requirements.text: Add the 8 user-uploaded images as static frontend assets and reference them by filename in the UI: IMG_20260208_024943140-1.jpg, IMG_20260208_024948850.jpg, IMG_20260208_024928950.jpg, IMG_20260208_024935455.jpg, IMG_20260208_024928950-1.jpg, IMG_20260208_024948850-1.jpg, IMG_20260208_024943140-2.jpg, IMG_20260208_024935455-1.jpg.

quotes: Make a section of images and add these images in the app

acceptanceCriteria: All 8 images are present in the frontend public/static assets and load correctly in production builds (no broken image links).
The UI references the exact provided filenames (including suffixes like -1, -2).

requirements.text: Create a dedicated "Images" (gallery) section in the app UI that displays the 8 uploaded images in a responsive grid layout with consistent spacing, rounded corners, and proper aspect-ratio handling (no layout shifts while loading).

quotes: Make a section of images and add these images in the app

acceptanceCriteria: There is a clearly labeled Images/Gallery section visible in the app.
On mobile, the grid adapts to smaller screens (e.g., 1â€“2 columns) and on larger screens uses more columns appropriately.

requirements.text: Add navigation so users can reach the new Images/Gallery section from the existing app structure (without removing any current sections), using a consistent navigation pattern already present in the app.

quotes: Make a section of images and add these images in the app

acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate to the Images/Gallery section via an in-app control (e.g., a tab within an existing section or a new entry point) without breaking the current Home/Education/Discipline/Sports/Notices/Dashboard navigation.
No existing navigation item is removed.

requirements.text: Enable viewing an image at larger size from the gallery (e.g., by tapping/clicking an image to open a preview overlay/dialog) with a clear way to close and return to the grid.

quotes: Make a section of images and add these images in the app

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping an image opens a larger preview.
The preview can be closed to return to the gallery grid.
The preview works for each of the 8 images.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Do not introduce any new backend storage or APIs for images; images must be served as static frontend assets.
nonGoals: Implementing image upload from within the app.
Persisting or managing gallery images in the Motoko backend.
Adding real-time image updates or syncing across devices.
